Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAbortableRequest
public class SingleHostRequest<T>
extends AbortableAsyncTask<T>

Request to a single host. Generally this type of request is made to track pixel or video events.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

Description copied from class: AbortableAsyncTask
